file_content.text: Your sister is on her way.
Thank you, Captain. When I heard you were here, I knew, I just knew, you were the one to ask.
Please accept this payment for your trouble.
I must make arrangements for a flight to Coruscant right away.
Please find my sister. I don't know how much longer mother can hold on.
Captain! I thought I would never find you. The minute I heard you were on Voss, I started searching....
You have a following....
I'm certain you have terribly important business, but might you find time to do one small service for a diplomat of the Republic? Er, me.
Somehow these things never end up that small.
What kind of service?
What's my incentive?
Yes, yes, of course. Don't worry about compensation.
No offense, but there's a Chagrian I need dead and fast.
Not interested.
Please! I've already called in every favor I dare ask the Voss.
Just hear me out. Her whole life, my sister's suffered from a rare form of Mizra Syndrome.
She would have died had I not landed this post on Voss. I was able to arrange for her to receive healing from the Mystics.
If she's healed, then what's the problem?
Sounds like you solved it.
I don't care what they did to her, I'm not going after the Mystics.
Mystics are off-limits.
It's nothing like that! I would never suggest--
Quit speaking diplomat and tell me the blasted job.
Spit it out!
My sister chose to stay and serve the Shrine of Healing as payment for her treatment. But now our mother is dying, and I have no way to reach her.
The whole path to the shrine, it's besieged by Gormak.
I can pay you handsomely if you would brave the Gormak to bring my sister word to come home.
If I find myself at the shrine, I promise I'll talk to your sister.
I'll do it.
How dangerous is this path?
Tell me more.
Dozens of pilgrims have been killed before they reach the top.
The Gormak seek to profane the sacred. Use care.
Thank you, Captain. I believe Kindra serves a Mystic named Kina-Re. I pray she lets her leave, and quickly--mother may not last long.
Get a Voss to carry your message. It's their shrine.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
If only they could get through Gormak lines....
